dublinCore.title: 113 HR 1838 IH: Enhanced Access to Medicaid Services Act of 2013
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Stivers(for himself andMr. Moran) introduced the following bill; which was referred to theCommittee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to apply the Medicaid primary care payment rate to additional physician providers of primary care services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Enhanced Access to Medicaid Services Act of 2013 .

section.header: Primary care payment rate for additional physician providers of primary care services

subsection.text: Section 1902(a)(13)(C) of the Social Security Act(42 U.S.C. 1396a(a)(13)(C))is amended by strikingor pediatricand insertingneurology, psychiatry, obstetrics and gynecology, or pediatric.
The amendment made bysubsection (a)shall take effect on the date of enactment of this Act and shall apply to medical assistance for primary care services provided on or after that date.
